required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Recovery of Carotid Body Function After Full Recovery Neuromuscular Block

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, cross over, experimental trial in which carotid body function will be evaluated in 35 healthy subjects during partial muscle relaxation and after recovery from muscle relaxation

primary_outcome.measure: Carotid body function after full recovery of neuromuscular block
primary_outcome.time_frame: 40 minutes after full recovery of neuromuscular block
primary_outcome.description: Carotid body function will be determined by measuring acute hypoxic ventilatory response

secondary_outcome.measure: Carotid body function at partial neuromuscular block TOF ratio 0.7
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 minutes after stable partial neuromuscular block
secondary_outcome.description: Carotid body function will be determined by measuring acute hypoxic ventilatory response

secondary_outcome.measure: Carotid body function at partial neuromuscular block TOF ratio 0.9
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 minutes after stable partial neuromuscular block
secondary_outcome.description: Carotid body function will be determined by measuring acute hypoxic ventilatory response

secondary_outcome.measure: Carotid body function at full recovery TOF ratio 1.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0 minutes after full recovery of neuromuscular block
secondary_outcome.description: Carotid body function will be determined by measuring acute hypoxic ventilatory response

secondary_outcome.measure: Carotid body function after full recovery of neuromuscular block
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 20 minutes after full recovery of neuromuscular block
secondary_outcome.description: Carotid body function will be determined by measuring acute hypoxic ventilatory response

arm_group.description: TOF ratio maintained at 0.9, spontaneous recovery
TOF ratio maintained at 0.7, spontaneous recovery
TOF ratio maintained at 0.7, reversal with sugammadex 2 mg/kg
TOF ratio maintained at 0.7, reversal with sugammadex 4 mg/kg

intervention.description: Rocuronium will be used to induce partial paralysis
Sugamamdex will be used to reverse muscle relaxation
